original_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Making of The Coming Out of Their Shells Tour
overview: The real story. Behind the scenes with the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles! Take the fantastic journey with Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles as they transform themselves into one of America's premiere rock and roll bands. Meet the people that helped them on the road, see interviews with the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles themselves and enjoy a bodacious portions of their totally groovis music!
tagline: This is their story, the story of how a gang of green went from under the streets to the top of the charts.
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Making of The Coming Out of Their Shells Tour
